name: PressPlayCalls
tagline: WE ANSWER YOUR CALLS, YOU DELIVER YOUR PROMISES
description:
The Pressplay Group has been working in fulfilment for over 20 years with a team that combines years of industry experience and expertise, enabling the delivery of a one-stop solution that allows clients to focus on what they do best. From the most basic of briefs, we can make it happen, today. They strive for the highest standards throughout every aspect of the fulfilment process - from call centre operations to the delivery at the customers door.
Performance and quality of service are continually analysed to ensure that a clients' brand is in safe hands, whilst delivering value for money.
READ MORE...
